pkgmetadata.longdescription: Converts a string to Camel Case with the ability to include words to skip over.Basic Usage===========.. code:: pythonfrom camelcase import CamelCasec = CamelCase()s = 'this is a sentence that needs CamelCasing!'print c.hump(s)# This is a Sentence That Needs CamelCasing!If you have particular words that you want to skip then you can do the following..... code:: pythonfrom camelcase import CamelCasec = CamelCase('little', 'another')s = 'this is a another sentence, but this one is a little different'print c.hump(s)# This is a another Sentence, But This One is a little Different
